Beginning with the Paris release, installation of the Hardware Asset
Management (HAM) plugin also provides the capability to capture asset
inventory located in a specific stockroom or location using the
ServiceNow Mobile Agent and Mobile Scanning capabilities.

Selected Answer: ABCF
Flow designer access and import sets are not granted by this role.
(Verified in HAM Simulator)

The HAM Admin role contains the following roles:
inventory_admin
catalog_manager
report_user
sn_hamp.ham_user
asset
procurement_admin

inventory_admin
catalog_manager
